SourceString: Leap to target location, dealing <b>{data.LandingDamage}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> on landing in a <b>{data.LandingRadius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius around you.

<b>{Dmg_UI}|round()%</> more Damage on landing.\nDeal <b>{LaunchDmg}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{data.LaunchRadius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius around your launch position.
Deal <b>{LaunchDmg}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{data.LaunchRadius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius around your launch position.

<b>{MPCost_UI}|round()%</> less Energy Cost.
<b>{CDMod_UI}|round()%</> less Cooldown Duration.
Your Leap deals no damage.
Tags: -<me_Exhaust>Exhaust</>
Gain <b>{Rage}|round()</> <me_Rage>Rage</> stacks if you hit any enemies on landing.
Instead deals <b>{WeaponDmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage on landing.\nMelee and Staff only.
Leap to target location, dealing <b>{data.WeaponDmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage on landing in a <b>{data.LandingRadius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius around you.
On launch and landing has <b>{StunChance_UI}|round()%</> chance to <me_Stun>Stun</> for <b>{StunDuration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.\n<b>+{BaseCD}|round()s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
On launch and landing has <b>{StunChance_UI}|round()%</> chance to <me_Stun>Stun</> for <b>{StunDuration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.

Stomp on the ground, dealing <b>{data.Dmg}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius around you and <me_Stun>Stun</> enemies hit for <b>{data.StunDuration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.

Consumes full <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> for <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage, <b>+{RadiusMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius and <b>+{StunDuration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</> <me_Stun>Stun</> Duration.\nTags: +<me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</>

Consumes full <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> for <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage, <b>+{RadiusMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius and <b>+{StunDuration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</> <me_Stun>Stun</> Duration.
On use gain <b>{RageGain}|round()</> <me_Rage>Rage</>.\n<b>{AilmentMod_UI}|round()%</> more <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</> per <me_Rage>Rage</>.

<b>+{StunDurationMod}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</> <me_Stun>Stun</> Duration.
<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Damage.
<b>+{CDMod}|round()s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
Tags: +<me_Disruption>Disruption</>
<b>+{StunDurationMod}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</> <me_Stun>Stun</> Duration, <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Damage, <b>+{CDMod}|round()s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
When you hit a <me_Channel>channeling</> enemy <b>+0.4s</> <me_Stun>Stun</> Duration.\nIf you hit a <me_Channel>channeling</> enemy reduces Cooldown by <b>{CDRefresh}%</> (once per use).

Deals <b>{data.WeaponDmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage.
Consumes full <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> for <b>50%</> more Damage.
Melee: <b>2.5m</> Range.
Ranged: <b>100%</> more Projectile Speed. <b>+1</> <me_Penetration>Projectile Penetration</>.

Has <b>{DmgPen_UI}%</> Damage Mitigation <me_Penetration_Damage>Penetration</>.\r\nEnemies hit have <b>-{ArmorRed}|round()</> <me_Armor>Armor</> Value for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> (non-stacking).

Hits <b>2</> times in one attack.
Attack Time is <b>20%</> longer.
<b>30%</> less Damage.
Melee only.
Hits <b>2</> times in one attack. Attack Time is <b>20%</> longer.\nMelee only.

The call of your horn debuffs enemies in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\r\nEnemies have <b>-{data.ResRed_UI}|round()%</> Damage <me_Resistance>Resistance</> for <b>{data.DebuffDuration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.

When directly used deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> to enemies with a <b>25%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\n<b>{ActionSpeedMod_UI}|round()%</> less Cast Speed.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.

The call of your horn hurts and <me_Weak>weakens</> enemies in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\nWhen directly used deals <b>{data.Damage}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\nEnemies have <b>-{data.ResRed_UI}|round()%</> Damage <me_Resistance>Resistance</> for <b>{data.DebuffDuration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.
Thundering Horn deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage against enemies inside a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}</> Energy Cost.
Deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage against enemies inside a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Enemies affected by Doom Horn have an additional <b>-{ResRedMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage <me_Resistance>Resistance</>.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.

After you hit an enemy with Doom Horn your next hit against this enemy with other active abilities deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_VitalityDam>Vitality Damage</>.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
After you hit an enemy with Doom Horn your next hit against this enemy with other active abilities deals <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_VitalityDam>Vitality Damage</>.
Whenever you hit an enemy affected by Doom Horn they take <b>{Dmg}|round()</> Spirit Damage.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Whenever you hit an enemy affected by Doom Horn they take <b>{Dmg}|round()</> Spirit Damage.
When directly used, you gain <b>{ASMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Attack and Cast Speed and <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Damage for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.
After a short wind up, attack <b>5</> times dealing <b>{data.WeaponDmg_UI}|round()% Weapon Damage</>.\r\nRequires Dagger, Sword, Spear or Ranged.\r\nCan be canceled by moving.
Deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage against <me_Channel>channeling</> or incapacitated enemies
The first attack has <b>+30%</> added Base <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\n<b>{AilmentMoreMod_UI}|round()%</> more <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
The first attack has <b>+30%</> added Base <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
Every attack deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage and has <b>{AilmentMod_UI}|round()%</> more <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</> than the previous.

Attack with a single fast dash attack instead.\nDeals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage against <me_Channel>Channeling</> enemies, <me_Stun>Stuns</> them for <b>1s</> and refunds <b>{MPRefund_UI}|round()%</> Energy spent.\nRequires Dagger, Sword or Spear.

Whenever an enemy hits you, <b>{StoredDmg_UI}|round()%</> of Damage Taken is stored (up to a total of <b>{MaxDmg}|round()</>).\nOn use expends the stored damage to deal it as added <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.
Sweep in a circle dealing <b>{data.WeaponDmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage in a <b>4m</> radius around you.\nRequires Melee.

Instead <me_Channel>Channel</> to spin dealing <b>{WeaponDmg_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> Weapon Damage in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\n<b>{MSMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> less Movement Speed while <me_Channel>Channeling</>.\nTags: +<me_Channel>Channel</>

Over <b>3s</> while <me_Channel>channeling</>, Damage increases by up to <b>{DmgRampUp_UI}|round()%</> and Area radius increases by up to <b>{AreaRampUp_UI}|round()%</>.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost per second.
Over <b>3s</> while <me_Channel>channeling</>, Damage increases by up to <b>{DmgRampUp_UI}|round()%</> and Area radius increases by up to <b>{AreaRampUp_UI}|round()%</>.

Gain <me_Rage>Rage</> on hit, not more than once every <b>{RageGainCD}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.
<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage per <me_Rage>Rage</> stack.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Whirlwind: <b>+{MPTickCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost per second.
Gain <me_Rage>Rage</> on hit, not more than once every <b>{RageGainCD}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.\n<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage per <me_Rage>Rage</> stack.
Consume all <me_Rage>Rage</> for <b>{DmgRageMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage per <me_Rage>Rage</> consumed.
Consume all <me_Rage>Rage</> for <b>{DmgRageMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage per <me_Rage>Rage</> consumed.
Consumes full <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> for <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage and <b>+{AilmentMod_UI}|round()%</> Base <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\nTags: +<me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</>
Consumes full <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> for <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage and <b>+{AilmentMod_UI}|round()%</> Base <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.

Deals <b>{VitDmg}|round()</> <me_VitalityDam>Vitality Damage</>.
Enemies hit take <b>{VitDot}|round()</> <me_VitalityDam>Vitality Damage</> every second and have <b>-15%</> <me_Bleed>Bleed</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> for <b>4s</>.
<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Weapon Damage.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Whirlwind: <b>+{MPTickCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost per second.
Enemies hit take <b>{VitDot}|round()</> <me_VitalityDam>Vitality Damage</> every second and have <b>-15%</> <me_Bleed>Bleed</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> for <b>4s</>.

Enemies hit are <me_Slow>slowed</> by <b>{Slow_UI}|round()%</> and have <b>{ArmorReduction}|round()</> <me_Armor>Armor</> Value for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</> (non-stacking).\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.\nWhirlwind: <b>+{MPTickCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost per second.
Enemies hit are <me_Slow>slowed</> by<b>{Slow_UI}|round()%</> and have <b>{ArmorReduction}|round()</> <me_Armor>Armor</> Value for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</> (non-stacking).
After the ability ends a whirl continues to deal <b>{Dmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage every <b>0.25s</> for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
After the ability ends a whirl continues to deal <b>{Dmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage every <b>0.25s</> for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.

After you stop <me_Channel>channeling</>, Whirlwind persists for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> and deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Damage.\nRamp Up\'s effects deplete over the duration.\n<b>+{MPTickCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost per second.

Multiple waves of arrows rain from the skies around the target location.
Deals <b>{data.WeaponDmg_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage in a <b>5m</> radius every <b>0.6</> seconds 
Shoots <b>{data.Repetitions}|round()</> waves.
Requires Bow.
<b>{AddedReps}|round()</> additional waves.\n<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Damage.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.

<b>+10%</> added Base <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
<b>{AilmentMoreMod_UI}|round()%</> more <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Damage.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Enemies hit are <me_Slow>slowed</> by <b>{Slow_UI}|round()%</> for <b>1s</> (non-stackable).\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Consumes full <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> to deal <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage and <me_Root>root</> for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</> on the first wave.
Has <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage and <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</> against targets for every time they were ever hit by Rain of Arrows (up to <b>{MaxDmgMod_UI}|round()%</>).
If Rain of Arrows hits only a single target, it deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage a second time.

<me_Channel>Channel</> to spin dealing <b>{data.WeaponDmg_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> Weapon Damage in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\n<b>25%</> less Movement Speed while <me_Channel>Channeling</>.\nRequires Melee Weapon.

Dash a short distance and <me_StrikeDam>strike</>.\nDeals more Damage against <me_Channel>Channeling</> enemies, <me_Stun>Stuns</> them for <b>1s</> and refunds Energy.\nRequires Dagger, Sword or Spear.
Emit an <me_Aura>Aura</> with a <b>{dataSus.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\nAura grants you and allies <b>+{dataBase.ArmorFlat}|round()</> <me_Armor>Armor</>.

Spawns a giant sword above your head that buffs you.
After the ability ends, the sword comes crashing down to damage enemies.
Buff lasts for <b>{dataActive.DurationTotal}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> and grants:
- <b>{dataBase.MSBonus_UI}|round()%</> increased Movement Speed
- <b>{dataBase.DmgBonus_UI}|round()%</> increased Total Damage
Sword crashes down with a <b>{dataActive.DelayTotal}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> delay and deals {AbilityDamage[Dmg1]}.

<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage with sword drop.\nBuff grants <b>{DmgIncMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Total Damage.\nThe sword drop now also deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</> to you.
Grants <b>{DmgIncMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Total Damage.\nThe sword drop now also deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</> to you.
